thread.title: Macy's to close 35-40 underperforming stores in early 2016
thread.title_full: Macy's to close 35-40 underperforming stores in early 2016 | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Macy's to close 35-40 underperforming stores in early 2016
text:
Sept 8 Department store operator Macy's Inc said it would shut 35-40 underperforming stores early next year as more and more customers move their shopping online.
The number of stores to be shut represent about 1 percent of the 770 stores it operates, the company said in a statement on Tuesday. (Reporting by Yashaswini Swamynathan in Bengaluru; Editing by Savio D'Souza )
